title: Black Screen After Champ Select
body: Alright, so I get a black screen right after champ select instead of going to the loading screen. I checked everything and my internet connection is good. I remember I saw in another discussion how to solve this, but I forgot what the solution was. Can someone give me a solution please!

replies.body:
Yeah me too! until yesterday the game worked just fine, but since yesterday I can only arrive at the champ select. When the champ select ends the client crashes and I can't do anythng about it. 
I tried the repair tool and even to uninstall and reinstall the game, but in the end I'm still here, not having any matches!
Please help us!

A black screen like this usually indicates a problem with your network trying to connect to the servers specifically.  I suggest going through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions.
I'm having the exact same problem! I'm running league on a Mac and it has worked perfectly fine until yesterday. Someone please help!!
